About me

I’m Leandro Lovisolo, a software developer and entrepreneur in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

Since 2011, I’ve been working on Cust√≥mica, an online t-shirt store for the Argentinian market where all the designs are user-contributed and anyone can design their own t-shirt.

In the past, I’ve worked at the local startup Livra.com, an online social shopping community, where I helped build their website and awesome community from the ground up.

You can follow me on Twitter, browse my open source projects at GitHub and see my profile on LinkedIn. Write me at hi@leandro.me.

About this blog

This blog is built with Jekyll and hosted on GitHub. The source code for this blog is available here. You’re welcome to fork it or clone it to create your own blog.
